AboutPage.title: About Real Hakuba
AboutPage.description: Learn about our premium vacation rentals in Hakuba Village

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.description: We collect the following information to provide our services:

items.booking: Booking information (check-in date, check-out date, number of guests)

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.description: We do not share your personal information with third parties except:

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. All communications are protected by SSL encryption.

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.description: We use cookies to provide better service:

items.essential: Essential cookies: Required for basic site functionality
items.analytics: Analytics cookies: To understand site usage
items.preferences: Preference cookies: To save language settings, etc.

items.access: Right to access your personal information
items.correction: Right to request correction of information
items.deletion: Right to request deletion of information

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For privacy-related questions, please contact us at:

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform and booking accommodations.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using Real Hakuba's platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.
acceptance.agreement: Your continued use of our platform constitutes acceptance of any updates or modifications to these terms.

service.title: Service Description
service.description: Real Hakuba operates as an online platform connecting guests with accommodation providers in Hakuba Village and surrounding areas.

items.platform: Online booking platform for vacation rentals and accommodations
items.properties: Curated selection of properties in Hakuba region
items.support: Customer support and booking assistance services

process.title: Booking Process
process.description: All bookings follow a standardized process to ensure clarity and security:

steps.search: Browse and select your desired property and dates
steps.request: Submit booking request with guest information and payment details
steps.confirmation: Receive booking confirmation after verification and approval

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.description: Cancellation policies vary by property and booking date. Please review the specific policy for your booking:

flexible.title: Flexible Policy
flexible.description: Full refund if cancelled 30+ days before check-in

rules.title: House Rules
rules.description: All guests must comply with property-specific rules and general guidelines to ensure a pleasant stay for everyone.

basic.title: Basic Rules
basic.smoking: No smoking in all indoor areas
basic.pets: No pets allowed unless specifically stated
basic.parties: No parties, events, or loud gatherings

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.description: Secure payment processing is handled through our trusted payment partners to protect your financial information.

methods.title: Accepted Payment Methods
methods.cards: Major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express)
methods.security: All transactions secured by Stripe with SSL encryption

guest.title: Guest Responsibilities
guest.property: Treat property with care and respect
guest.rules: Follow all house rules and local regulations
guest.damages: Report any damages or issues immediately

host.title: Host Responsibilities
host.accuracy: Provide accurate property descriptions and photos
host.cleanliness: Ensure property is clean and ready for guests
host.availability: Honor confirmed bookings and maintain availability

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Real Hakuba acts as a platform connecting guests and hosts. Our liability is limited as follows:

limitations.platform: We are not responsible for the condition, safety, or legality of properties
limitations.thirdparty: We do not control the actions of guests, hosts, or third parties
limitations.force: We are not liable for damages caused by force majeure events

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.description: We encourage resolution through direct communication. For formal disputes, the following process applies:

contact.title: Direct Contact
contact.description: Contact our support team within 24 hours of any issues

mediation.title: Mediation
mediation.description: Attempt resolution through mediation before legal action

jurisdiction.title: Legal Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: Governed by Japanese law, disputes resolved in Nagano District Court

contact.title: Questions About These Terms
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us using the information below:
contact.address: Hakuba Village, Kitaazumi District, Nagano Prefecture, Japan

Header.contactUsDesc: Get in touch with our team

SectionHero.title: Real Hakuba
SectionHero.subtitle:
Discover authentic Hakuba experiences
from snow-capped winters to lush alpine summers.

SectionProperties.title: Hakuba Accommodations by Real Hakuba
SectionProperties.subtitle: Hand-picked chalets, lodges and villas across Hakuba.

SectionFun.error: Unable to load weather data. Please try again later.

bike.title: Biking
bike.desc: Ride through emerald paddies and cedar forests while the Northern Alps stand beside you. Quiet lanes lead to riverside trails and alpine switchbacks; refill with spring water, sample Shinshu apple pie, and pedal through a living postcard.

bbq.title: Barbecue
bbq.desc: Golden valley light, grills crackling, Shinshu wagyū and sweet corn sizzling while fireflies drift between pines. On a chalet deck or by the river, wood-smoke and mountain air turn dinner into a memory.

sup.title: SUP
sup.desc: Glide over mirror-still lakes that reflect snow peaks. Only the dip of your paddle and wild-flower scent break the silence. Beginners hug coves; pros strike yoga poses at sunrise under rose-gold ridges.

plunge.title: Plunge
plunge.desc: From cedar sauna to glacier-fed stream: ten icy seconds leave you tingling and reborn. The rush eases sore muscles after a powder day and sharpens focus—an alpine ritual framed by mossy rocks and birdsong.

ContactModal.title: Contact us
ContactModal.successSubtitle: We’ll get back to you soon.

FAQPage.title: Frequently asked questions
FAQPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about staying at our properties in Hakuba
FAQPage.hereToHelp: We're here to help. Get in touch and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

checkInOut.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
checkInOut.answer: Check-in is from 3:00 PM and check-out is by 10:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out may be available upon request, subject to availability.

cancellation.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: Free cancellation up to 30 days before arrival. No refunds for cancellations within 30 days.

deposit.question: Do I need to pay a deposit?
deposit.answer: For bookings within 30 days of check-in, full payment is required at the time of booking. For bookings more than 30 days in advance, we will securely store your payment information and charge the full amount 30 days before your arrival date.

reservation.question: How do I make a reservation?
reservation.answer: You can book directly through our website. Or send us an email or call us to make a request of reservation. We'll confirm availability and send you booking details within 24 hours.

petFriendly.question: Are the properties pet-friendly?
petFriendly.answer: Most of our properties welcome pets! Please check the specific property details or contact us to confirm pet policies for your chosen accommodation.

wifi.question: Is Wi-Fi available?
wifi.answer: Yes, all our properties offer free high-speed Wi-Fi suitable for remote work and streaming.

linens.question: Are linens and towels provided?
linens.answer: Yes, all properties are fully equipped with fresh linens, towels, and basic toiletries for your convenience.

hvac.question: Do the properties have heating and air conditioning?
hvac.answer: All properties have heating systems for winter. Most properties also have air conditioning for summer comfort.

washing.question: Is there a washing machine?
washing.answer: Yes, all our properties include washing machines with dryer functionality.

fromTokyo.question: How do I get to Hakuba from Tokyo?
fromTokyo.answer: The most convenient way is by Shinkansen to Nagano Station (1.5 hours from Tokyo), then bus or train to Hakuba (1 hour). We can provide detailed directions upon booking.

needCar.question: Do I need a car in Hakuba?
needCar.answer: While not essential, a car provides more flexibility. There are local buses and many restaurants/activities within walking distance of our properties.

parking.question: Is parking available?
parking.answer: Yes, all our properties include free parking spaces for guests.

trainStation.question: How far are you from the nearest train station?
trainStation.answer: Our properties are 10-20 minutes by car from Hakuba Station. We can arrange pickup for guests arriving by train.

summer.question: What activities are available in summer?
summer.answer: Summer offers hiking, mountain biking, rafting, SUP on Lake Aoki, gondola rides, and visiting local onsens. The mountains are beautiful for outdoor adventures!

skiResorts.question: How far are the ski resorts?
skiResorts.answer: Our properties are conveniently located 5-15 minutes from major ski resorts including Happo-One, Goryu, and Hakuba 47.

restaurants.question: Are there restaurants nearby?
restaurants.answer: Yes! Hakuba has excellent dining options from traditional Japanese to international cuisine, most within a short drive or walk from our properties.

arrangeActivities.question: Can you help arrange activities?
arrangeActivities.answer: Absolutely! We're happy to help book ski lessons, equipment rental, restaurant reservations, and other activities.
